  • Uses of Accepted in org.jgrapes.http

    Methods in org.jgrapes.http with parameters of type Accepted
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    HttpServer.onAccepted(Accepted event, IOSubchannel netChannel)
    Creates a new downstream connection as LinkedIOSubchannel of the network connection, a HttpRequestDecoder and a HttpResponseEncoder.

    SslCodec.onAccepted(Accepted event, IOSubchannel encryptedChannel)
